body_html:
It is my mistake of Transpose operation usage. I have used a permutation tensor with DT_INT64 instead of DT_INT32 type.

Scope root = Scope::NewRootScope();

Tensor x_tensor( DT_INT64, TensorShape( { i64TestSize, 3i64 } ) );
Tensor perm_tensor( DT_INT64, TensorShape( { 2i64 } ) );

// Filling x_tensor and perm_tensor with some values

auto y_transpose = Transpose( root, x_tensor, perm_tensor );

session.Run( {}, { transposed_x }, &outputs );

It is sometimes not obvious which type should be used for tensors in a processing chain. If a graph is not working, please check that the output type of the node is identical to the input type of the successor node.
